title: Enmity theme specification
description:
Credits for [color descriptions](https://github.com/compilekaiten/enmity-Themes-Color-Map) goes to NEO#7154/compilekaiten.

Most pattern properties are there so the schema can be described fully; any key without a description should be considered "usage unknown".

hex_color.description: While Enmity does take #RRGGBBAA values, the alpha value is ignored when converting.

rgba_color.description: Similar to CSS's `rgba()`, but Enmity only accepts `rgba(r, g, b, a)`, not `rgba(r g b a)` or `rgba(r g b / a)`.

transparent_color.description: Special keyword to mark a color as fully transparent.

color_array.description: First item is color for dark mode, second is color for light mode.

author.description: The author who made the theme.

theme_color_map.description: Properties that themes text and most background elements. All of these support different light mode and dark mode colors.

BACKGROUND_PRIMARY.description: Main background (DMs, channels, user list, friends tab, search tab, mentions tab, user profiles, action sheets/popups)

BACKGROUND_SECONDARY.description:
Background for:
- Top left button
- Join Server button
- Call and Message buttons in profile
- Missed Call
- Code block
- Profile/server info bottom
- Reactions button
- Embed
- Slash Command top bar
- @user background
- Emote picker

BACKGROUND_SECONDARY_ALT.description:
Background for:
- Profile notes
- About Me
- Chat input (including attachments/gift buttons)
- Emote category picker

BACKGROUND_TERTIARY.description:
Background for:
- Border when elements (e.g. server list, user list) are slid out
- Search bar
- Outline of "About me" and "Notes" in profile card
- Spoilers
- Top bar separator when in conversation
- Separator between setting cells
- Buttons like Profiles and Search

BACKGROUND_ACCENT.description:
- Reply Pipe 
- "Edit User Profile" button
- Album Buttons
- Thread Buttons,
- Sometimes flashes this color when stuff loads

BACKGROUND_FLOATING.description: Profile Top background, Server Boost Page Icons

BACKGROUND_MOBILE_SECONDARY.description: Channel List/DM Background, Global Header Color, Online status, Background in chat input

BACKGROUND_MODIFIER_ACCENT.description: Seperators (Server List Top, Bottom Bar, Server Info, User List, User Info, @, Notifications, Friends, Search, Settings)

BACKGROUND_MODIFIER_ACTIVE.description: Background color when clicking/holding a button (DM User, Channel, Server, Rectangle Buttons)

BACKGROUND_MODIFIER_SELECTED.description: Background color of selected User or Channel

CHANNELS_DEFAULT.description: Unselected DM User text color(including status), Server Category text color

HEADER_PRIMARY.description:
Text color for: 
- Direct Messages 
- Username (in DMs)
- Server Name
- Channel name
- User list
- Friends/Mentions tab
- Setting cells
- Follow Channels button
- Invite Members button
- Slash Commands text
- Some pop-up text (e.g. Enmity's "add theme")

HEADER_SECONDARY.description:
Text color for:
- Discriminators (#1234 thing in usernames)
- Profile card section headers (Connections, About me, Notes),
- Server description (online and member count), 
- Status in user list (listening, playing, etc), 
- User list subtitles
- Slash Command descriptions 
- Search titles
- Most settings section headers

INTERACTIVE_ACTIVE.description: Selected Server bar, Selected user text DMs, Selected Channel text, Unread Channel text and dot, @ user name text, # channel text, bottom bar icon fill, some random titles

INTERACTIVE_MUTED.description: Unselected muted channel text, block quote bar

INTERACTIVE_NORMAL.description:
- Button/Glyph accent colors (Top left button glyph, 3 bars, Call,
Video, User list)
- User list (Threads, Pins, Notifs, Settings, Role names)
- User Info (Message, Call, Video)
- Server Info (Boost Text, Invite, Notifs)
- Channel (Search, User list, Add Files, Gift, Emoji buttons, add reactions)
- Slash Command title, Emoji bottom bar glyph color, # channel glyphs)
- bottom bar inactive icon fill
- typing indicator

TEXT_MUTED.description:
- Search bar text
- timestamp
- chat input text 
- Discriminators 
- Slash command owner text,
- Symbols (@, Lock, # (except muted channels))
- various subtitles (settings, server info)
- Emoji/GIF/Stickers category text

TEXT_NORMAL.description: Global text color (DMs, Channels, Typing text, Server info boxes text, User info boxes text, Settings text)

PRIMARY_DARK.description: Profile Notes text, Popup box separators

PRIMARY_DARK_100.description: Popup text color, search bar cursor color

PRIMARY_DARK_300.description: Grabber color, glyph color, "No Pinned Messages" text, Channel Settings channel name, Connections text color

PRIMARY_DARK_360.description: Unselected and unread and unmuted channel name text

PRIMARY_DARK_400.description: Different Day Message seperator, Search tab subtext, 2FA text, 'New Unreads' banner, @ user name text color

PRIMARY_DARK_500.description: Invite Button background, User Watch Live button, Default (grey) Role circle color, "Public" server button

PRIMARY_DARK_600.description: Chat Input Border Background fill, Global? pop up background

PRIMARY_DARK_630.description: Hold/Click on message background, Slash Command background, Search in Channel background, Spotify Now playing scrubber bar

PRIMARY_DARK_700.description: Top and Bottom bar Seperators, Global Toast Background, Role Background color, Side of screen flashes this color sometimes ???

PRIMARY_DARK_800.description: The Entire Bottom bar (and homebar) (Discord Icon, People Icon, Profile, etc.), Tints GIF categories in search

BRAND_NEW.description: Top left button background, New message Top banner, Floating new message banner progress bar, Global Switch color, Send button background, bot tag background, add to server button

WHITE.description: Top Left button icon fill, DMs username text, Server invite button text, No Role or default color role (grey) username color, User profile role text color, global spinners, Send button glyph, global cursor color, bot tag text color, add files button text color, GIF text, server with banner text and 3 dots, public server text, channel search text, (edited text subscript), follow channel text color

^STATUS_(RED|YELLOW|GREEN|GREY|ORANGE)(_.description: Various colored elements like logout text, security text. Pain in the ass. good luck

unsafe_colors.description: Unsafe colors, themes the grey bar under the keyboard (for now)

CHAT_GREY.description: homebar annoying ass grey bar color
